Description:
A Prestigious Nature Lovers Retreat
Private native gardens and manicured lush lawns besiege this premier 13th Beach property, harnessing an enviable natural energy across a peaceful 2900m2 (approx) allotment. A privilege of open space complements the luxurious custom built 3BR home, set up for all season enjoyment in a most opulent manner.
-A sense of grandeur is felt upon approach, tucked into the end of a quiet drive, shrouded by native vegetation
-Soaring ceilings, highlight glazing and seamless outdoor flow create the footwork for a light filled living zone
-Perfectly orientated to take advantage of pleasing sunny aspects to the north and ambient course outlooks on the south
-Both sides of this well designed family home open up to take advantage of cross ventilation and seasonal changes
-The grand master suite enjoys beautiful garden outlooks, a WIR with automated lighting and ensuite bathroom
-Entertainers will delight in the contemporary kitchen, boasting stone benchtops, Smeg appliances and walk in pantry
-Two further bedrooms flank the second living area to the rear and glorious main bathroom with freestanding bath
-Bespoke joinery is a complementary touch throughout, continued within the study and huge linen walk in linen/storeroom
-A well-equipped workshop space offers flexibility as an artists studio, 4th bedroom or additional living space
-Underfloor hydronic heating, a commodious gas log fire and air-conditioning are on hand should the need arise
-An established veggie patch, rainwater tanks and professionally landscaped gardens are a green thumbs delight
-The DLUG enjoys direct internal access, with extra OSP available for trailers or additional small equipment
-Approximately 6 minutes in the car to the Barwon Heads village, or 25 minutes to the Geelong CBD
-An obvious choice for golf enthusiasts, with all the facilities of the award winning 13th Beach Golf Links at hand
A most covetable location where the sounds of the sea and distant dune outlooks, contrast against organic farmland views to the western boundary of Barwon Heads. This property is living proof that you really can have it all!
Insights: 42 Second Drive, Connewarre VIC 3227 was last sold in 2018 and 4 other 3 bedroom house in Connewarre have recently been sold.

Description:
Golf Course Holiday Lifestyle
This fully furnished apartment is ideal for investors, currently leased at $280.00 pw. Holiday makers have the comforts of reverse Cycle Heating and Cooling, One bedroom, bathroom, Open plan living/meals and kitchen with a charming covered and secluded balcony with golf course views. Within walking distance to 13th Beach, patrolled beaches and only minutes drive to the heart of the Barwon Heads cafes, local restaurants and shopping. Car park space available also. What more could you want?

Description:
Custom Design With Dual Golf Course Frontage
Architecturally designed and masterfully built, this luxury residence showcases sophisticated entertaining and seamless connection to the surrounding natural environment. Essential to the idyllic 13th Beach lifestyle, tranquil fairway views set the pace for a relaxed lifestyle, conveniently positioned just minutes from the buzz of Barwon Heads Village.
-Set over 820sqm (approx.), one of only a handful of homes with dual golf course frontage
-Located in the prestigious 13th Beach Estate, a gated community within earshot of the surf beach
-Modern architecture offers framed views across the rolling fairways and coastal landscape
-North facing decks and private outdoor living spaces are interwoven into interior living zones
-Great separation for family or visitors, with guest and children's wing separate to the master
-A striking façade stands out from the crowd with clean lines of spotted gum and Brazilian slate
-Step up past native gardens into a timber wrapped entry, looking back at remote fairway views
-The central courtyard can be accessed via floor to ceiling glass doors and bathes the hall in light
-Brazilian slate runs through living and wet areas, with natural tones to mimic the coastal landscape
-Be treated to further views of the beach course to the rear, via the breezy outdoor room
-Main living is beneath a recessed ceiling with feature lights evoking a grand sense of space
-Stunning gas log fire above a wide stone hearth exudes contemporary style and functionality
-Entertaining flows naturally to the deck and into the terrace garden with soothing water feature
-Cooks will love the high-end kitchen adorned with stone tops, and clever pantry storage system
-Soft close drawers, Miele double ovens, Asko dishwasher and double F&P fridge are highlights
-North facing master with large BIRs, exquisite ensuite and private balcony is a personal oasis
-Upstairs guest suite with access to 2nd living and entertaining balcony overlooks the creek course
-Children's wing with 2 queen sized bedrooms, both with private outlooks and wall to wall robes
-Bathroom boasts stunning floor to ceiling matte white tiling and deep bath with stone surround
-Frameless shower screens, stone vanities and high-end Roger Sellers fixtures to all bathrooms
-Laundry with exceptional storage, 6000L combined water tanks plumbed for home and garden use
-Zoned heating and cooling compliments double glazed windows for optimum thermal performance
-Hydronic underfloor heating and heated towel rails ensure winter mornings are comfortable
-All in-home climate, entertainment, and lighting is controlled by a central ‘CBUS' touchscreen
-Ducted vacuum system, security alarm system and video intercom provide added peace of mind
-Oversized DLUG plus room for a golf cart and additional storage, with internal and rear access
-Walk to 13th Beach following the trails through the dunes, after dinner at the resort clubhouse
-5mins to Barwon Heads Village and the calm waters and sandy beaches along the Barwon River
-7 minutes to Warralily shopping centre, and only 25mins drive to Geelong CBD
Surrounded by a naturally beautiful environment moments from all you'll ever need- this unique masterpiece is one not to be missed. Inspect without delay.

Description:
‘Avonlea’ - A Picturesque Bush Retreat
Auction - Saturday 22nd of September at 11am
Tap into your inner hobby farmer and savour the peace and solitude of a country setting, with all the culture and comforts of village assets closeby. Accommodating a charming and recently updated 1960’s cottage with plenty of scope for further improvement (STCA), this property presents as a fantastically unique semi-rural offering, just seven minutes (approx) from beautiful Barwon Heads.
-A manageable allotment of 740m2 is ideal for those looking to secure the benefits of a country lifestyle with lower maintenance
-Northern orientation to the rear creates a beautiful suntrap, perfect for outdoor entertaining or propagation to thrive
-It’s hard to beat the peace and quiet on offer here, native bird songs and distant cattle calls your daily soundtrack
-Embrace a semi-sustainable lifestyle with a chicken coop already in place and plenty of room for veggie gardens and fruit trees
-The updated 3BR cottage has priceless original features throughout, including hardwood timber floors and windows
-Boasting a freshly painted interior and fully renovated bathroom while retaining the existing character of the home.
- Commodious wood fire gifts ambiance and warmth to the spacious living room, with ample sash windows framing farmland views and additional reverse cycle split system
-Double french doors invite you to the sunny timber deck from the kitchen/dining, flowing onto the fantastic rear yard
-A single garage and additional shed provide enough space for multiple vehicles and equipment, OSP also available
-Have your toes on the sand in under 10 minutes and enjoy the benefits of the new Warralily shopping centre close by
-An ideal location for those commuting to Geelong or Melbourne CBD’s, centrally set to shorten the journey
It's a rare commodity to have the best of both worlds! We look forward to seeing you at Auction.

Description:
Secluded Coastal Luxury
With breathtaking dune views across the 14th hole of the Beach course, this classically designed architectural home offers a life of secluded luxury within the exclusive 13th Beach Estate. Northern light fills internal living spaces with expertly oriented entertaining zones making the most of the sunshine, fresh southerly breezes, and gorgeous golf course views.
-Set within privatising native landscaping on 788sqm (approx.) overlooking the Beach course
-Architecturally designed over 2 light filled levels, with multiple outdoor entertaining spaces
-Extensive glazing highlights fresh white interiors, and contrasting charcoal concrete flooring
-Upstairs main living and dining beneath vaulted ceilings soaks up panoramic dune and course views
-Family kitchen with stone topped island, SMEG oven and grill with Bosch induction cooktop
-Access to scenic southern deck from elegant Master BR with His/Her WIR and spacious ensuite
-Open double glazed windows and sliding stackers to invite the sound of crashing waves inside
-Guest bedroom with glass slider to northern entertaining deck located with guest powder room
-Downstairs retreat and 3 queen sized bedrooms offers fantastic family or guest accommodation
-Winter made enjoyable with cosy wood fires to upstairs and downstairs living zones
-Family bathroom, additional powder and wash basin ensure the morning rush is eased
-Triple remote LUG provides a wealth of storage and/or golf cart parking
-Drive the cart or walk straight to 13th Surf Beach with exclusive access for residents of the estate
-Enjoy dinners at the Golf Club, members only gym use and premier golf course at your doorstep
-8' to Barwon Heads cafes and shops, 25' to Geelong and only 90' to Melbourne via freeway
Come and experience this exclusive residence for yourself, and fall in love with the natural beauty that surrounds this sought after coastal location. Inspect today.

Description:
Bush To Beach - Rare Coastal Acreage
A rare opportunity presents itself to acquire 2.6 acres (approx) of a gentle north facing slope with perfect placement in beautiful Connewarre, just moments from Barwon Heads and the best of the Surfcoast.
-Enjoy the peace and quiet on offer here and the chance to design and build your dream home in a blue chip location (STCA)
-Preferred orientation allows you to utilise the benefits of southerly ocean breezes and northern sunshine
-Design a home where calming semi-rural outlooks are enjoyed from all aspects
-Gifting you the somewhat rare option of plentiful space to live a semi-sustainable lifestyle, moments from town
-Enjoy the convenience of being 5 minutes away from the Warralily Village supermarkets, shops and cafes
-A brief 10 min drive arrives you in popular Barwon Heads, boasting stunning surf beaches, famous golf courses and the beauteous Barwon Estuary
-Similar distance to the surfing mecca of Torquay, secluded Breamlea/Bancoora beaches and industrious Geelong CBD
-Melbourne commuters will enjoy quick access to the Ring Road, an opportunity to enjoy the best of both worlds
-Zoned for multiple preferred local schools, the ideal spot to raise a family with plenty of room to grow
This unique offering cannot be overlooked and is sure to impress those looking for an idyllic semi-rural lifestyle with all the benefits of the beach.

Description:
Connewarre Lifestyle Opportunity On 60 Acres (Approx)
Enjoyed by the same family for over 40 years, this ambient Connewarre holding offers a plethora of opportunity for the perceptive purchaser. If you’re looking to establish yourself within moments from the coast, appreciating comforting views across Lake Connewarre to the peaks of the You Yangs, this potential driven 60 acre (approx) property will ‘have you at hello’.
-North facing orientation ensures the existing home is sunny and filled with natural light, perfecting rural outlooks
-Timber verandahs hug the north elevation, flowing through to an outdoor alfresco fit for Christmas dinner
-Three bedrooms and two living areas offer a flexible layout, with enough space for couples and growing families
-In original condition, the spaciously set main bathroom offers a separate shower room and w.c for convenience
-The 2nd living space enjoys stunning rural outlooks, with a large wood fire ensuring ambience and warmth
-Currently utilised to run cattle, the flat acreage boasts six secure paddocks and additional small holding pens
-Further outbuildings include a huge shed/workshop, 4 bay machinery shed, hay store and garden sheds
-Hints of semi-sustainability are here, with vegetable gardens, fruit trees and ready to occupy chicken coop
-The 38,000 litre rainwater tank supplies the main residence with ease; with troughs and gardens using town water supply
-Electric fencing allows stock yards and paddocks to remain secure at all times, deterring animals from boundaries
-The water bore allows 7,500 litres (approx) of water per hour to be pumped and dispersed across the property
-Primary vehicles are easily accommodated for within the oversized double lock up garage with workshop space
-An easy 10 minute drive into the Barwon Heads village, gifting you the opportunity to enjoy the best of both worlds
-Access to the Barwon Heads Airport and public transport is an added convenience for students and commuters
-This central location ensures close proximity to beaches, Geelong CBD, Torquay and new Warralily Shopping Centre
A rare opportunity for you to embrace rural space with the benefits of all coastal assets close by. Inspect today and realise the potential on offer here.

Description:
When Only the Best Will Do 4.04ha 10 acres approx.
This magnificent Connewarre holding is situated within close proximity of Geelong, Barwon Heads, the new Armstrong Creek shopping centre, also within easy access of Torquay and the surf beaches.
This classic property features an impressive family residence full of character, outstanding outbuildings, a wonderful established garden, six main paddocks, electric fencing, large spring fed dam and shelter belts.
The home comprises a formal lounge, family room, large country kitchen with walk in pantry, four bedrooms, two bathrooms, under cover alfresco area, dining room and sunroom.
There are several outdoor entertainment areas, a huge shed decked out with three additional bedrooms, living room, extra bathroom, games room, handyman workshop and home office.
Extras include town and tank water, original diary, four bay machinery shed, storage shed and garaging.
A truly unique holding located in one of the region's most sought after locations.
Insights: 352 Lake Road, Connewarre VIC 3227 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Spectacular Architectural Design At 13th Beach
Spectacular architectural design and a leisure-based location come together with excellent effect at this stunning family home. The exclusive location offers stunning views over the 5th green and 6th tee of the Creek Course. The floorplan is zoned to achieve 2 completely separate living wings. High-end holidays are a breeze, with this uniquely beautiful home catering for even the largest of families with a flexible floorplan and zoned living. There is a completely separate self contained wing of the home with kitchenette for guests, or grown up kids- that may want their space!
-The entrance hall has real wow factor
-The raked ceiling ascend towards the rear capturing the epic links views on both levels
-A rammed earth wall spans the home dividing the wings and linking indoors with outdoors
-The earth wall provides a basis for the warming decor, as well as fantastic thermal benefits
-Polished concrete and Australian hardwood floors team well with the earth wall
-Sensational open plan living at rear features a concealed kitchen and walls of stacking glass glass doors for indoor outdoor living
-Adjoining alfresco entertaining with gorgeous links views and an outdoor kitchen
-Timber bi-fold panelling allows visual access to the kitchen, the swinging door is a highlight
-900mm gas/electric cooker, Asko dishwasher and sleek glass splashbacks
-Caesarstone benchtops and many easy-access drawers
-The walk-in pantry and adjoining laundry are great domestic assets
-In the entrance hall, a feature timber slider accesses a fully self-contained 2BR wing
-The BRs in this wing boast en suites, fitted robes and ceiling fans
-The north-facing living zone features wet bar, SS AC, a private BBQ deck and separate access
-Private laundry facilities make this wing ideal for house guests or a B&B business (STCA)
-A home theatre, double garage, 3rd BR and powder room complete the lower level
-Family-sized home theatre features projector and sound proof walls
-The oversized double garage boasts built-in storage and internal access
-The bespoke steel, glass and timber stairwell leads to the master’s quarters above
-This floor includes an office space and 2 large BRs that flank walk-in robes and an en suite
-The master BR and office boast exceptional northern views over the Creek course
-The versitile space adjoining the master would ideal for a parents retreat, home office, studio
-The en suite features an in situ shower, twin vanity and separate toilet nook
-Extensive fitted walk-in robes, with a laundry chute, service both upstairs BRs
-Stylish wet areas boast in situ showers, Caesarstone topped vanities and designer tapware
-Underfloor gas hydronic heating with finger-touch control tailors the climate
-The home is double glazed with breezy louvers for cross ventilation
-Surround sound indoors and out
This impressive home is so versatile and comes with an attractive array of benefits afforded only to the 13th Beach community. View without delay!
Insights: 18 Plantation Drive, Connewarre VIC 3227 was last sold in 2018 and 3 other 4 bedroom house in Connewarre have recently been sold.

Description:
An Ideal Way of Life
Two complimentary golf share memberships to play 13th Beach Golf Links championship courses available. Private access to 13th Beach Surf Beach and 13th Beach Life Saving Club. Design guidelines to protect your space and views. Generous lot size 924sqm (approx) All services available including nbnTM network. An hour from Melbourne, twenty minutes from Geelong and just minutes from Barwon Heads on the Bellarine Peninsula. Modern Clubhouse and Restaurant facilities available to all residents. Stunning vistas within a breathtaking natural environment.Take advantage of the lifestyle and community Cashmore Drive has to offer, it’s the perfect place to build not just a home, an ideal way of life.

Description:
North Facing 880sqm Vacant Land
Located in the famous 13th Beach Golf Links Resort home to the Vic Open, this gated community offers privacy and integrity in peaceful and stunning natural surrounds. Build your new home nestled amongst high quality existing homes. This block offers you a generous land size of 880sqm approx. with a north facing back garden perfect for growing families or those who enjoy the luxury of space. This location is a gateway to the Bellarine Peninsula, Barwon Heads village and your choice of pristine turquoise beaches. Take advantage of the lifestyle this location and community has to offer; enjoy weekend trips to local wineries, gorge yourself on sumptuous local cuisine, or bike down the Bellarine Rail Trail. With Geelong and Melbourne within easy driving distance you can really have it all! Make the change and never look back.

Description:
An Inspiring Rural Vista
AUCTION SATURDAY 5TH MAY 2018 @ 1PM
Situated in picturesque Graham Lane, this private block offers so much more than a rural ‘blank canvas’. Connewarre is fast becoming popular for its close proximity to world class surf beaches, fantastic schools, trendy coastal towns and shopping centres. Add to this the rare benefit of space on 2.5 acres and an inspiring rural vista, all you’ll need to do is create your dream home! (STCA)
-Graham Lane is quietly positioned, moments to Breamlea Surf Beach and Point Impossible
-Enter down a tree lined driveway that winds around past a small dam, and flowering gums
-Privately placed, with a panoramic rural vista and plenty of scope for design (STCA)
-2.5 acres (approx) of gently sloping land, surrounded by neighbouring farmland and horses
-Building envelope allows the design of a home with a south westerly, rural outlook (STCA)
-Create an expansive family home, capturing coastal breezes and abundance of light (STCA)
-Fully fenced, the land provides space for gardens, animals and hobby farm pursuits
-For equine enthusiasts, the pony club is just a short ride away for the kids!
-A mix of established flowering gums, Cypress and natives line the perimeter of the block
-Town water is connected, with power ready to connect to at the front gate
-Endless lifestyle benefits on offer, with beaches, wineries and coastal towns all within reach
-Take your pick of the world class surf beaches on hand; Bancoora (2mins) , 13th Beach or Torquay
-Warralily Shopping Centre conveniently located only 5 mins away for all the essentials
-10mins to Barwon Heads, Geelong or Torquay and the many towns of the Bellarine Peninsula
-Only 10mins drive to Marshall station- join other locals for an easy 1hr commute to Melbourne
This well proportioned block has huge potential for a dream coastal home, and opportunities like this are becoming harder to find! Contact us to arrange a private inspection.
Insights: 51 Graham Lane, Connewarre VIC 3227 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Country Meets The City & Surf On Approx 4.15 Acres
This superbly located 3 bedroom family home offers premier rural living on the edge of the city and within a stone's throw of world famous beaches. Offering approx 4.15 acres of established land with stables, dedicated paddocks and extensive shedding, this property is only 3 minutes to Breamlea/Bancoora Beach & a 10 min drive to the coastal townships of Torquay, Barwon Heads & the Ring Road for Melbourne commuters while only 15mins from the Geelong CBD .
This lovely home is flooded with natural light & has been designed to overlook your yards & paddocks from within. The central family room adjoins the updated kitchen with new cabinetry & stone bench tops, corner pantry & stainless steel appliances. The formal lounge & main bedroom with air conditioner, walk in robe & full ensuite are positioned away from the minor bedrooms, both with robes & family bathroom. There are covered verandahs both sides of the home which is a perfect place to relax & unwind, whilst you overlook your property.
Well set up outside there is a 3 sided machinery shed, measuring 10x10m with 5.5m clearance. A double garage is attached to the home along with a second double galvanized shed & lined single shed. The stable complex comprises of 2 stalls & fenced yards, tack room & open bay, plus four fenced paddocks. Extras include, security lighting, double gated driveway, water tank, loading ramp, well established trees all serviced by town water.
Privacy is ensured with mature trees on the boundary. With Breamlea beach 3 minutes down the road & within easy reach of the newly completed ring road entrance, access to Geelong's Northern Suburbs & Melbourne is a breeze. This truly is the best of all worlds on offer & sure to impress.
Insights: 70 Bluestone School Road, Connewarre VIC 3227 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Country On The Coast - A Perfect Lifestyle Property
Listing in conjunction with One Agency Shaun O'Callaghan, Torquay Ph: 0477 881 808
Set on a sprawling acreage behind Breamlea’s famed Bancoora Beach, Dans Road offers an idyllic coastal country lifestyle with walking tracks, BMX and skate park, playground and horse-riding club and arena just a short walk away.
An entertainer’s dream, the single-level home boasts several living areas including a large rumpus room that flows outside to an undercover heated pool and spa.
Each of the four bedrooms are well appointed with three featuring built-in robes. The master offers walk-in robe, an expansive view courtesy of the large bay window and boasts an ensuite with spa bath and his/her vanity. A convenient large study with built-in cabinetry could be converted to a fifth bedroom if required.
Outside, green thumbs will be delighted with the rose and veggie gardens, as well as spacious work-shed area and storage shed. The property is on town water, however a large 23,000 litre tank assists with servicing the swimming pool and vegetable garden.
Dans Road’s appeal lies in its relative seclusion from the hustle and bustle but ease of access to the charming townships of Barwon Heads and Torquay, whilst the Warralily shopping village and school is just a short drive away.
*All information offered by Bellarine Property is provided in good faith. It is derived from sources believed to be accurate and current as at the date of publication and as such Bellarine Property simply pass this information on. Use of such material is at your sole risk. Prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries with respect to the information that is passed on. Bellarine Property will not be liable for any loss resulting from any action or decision by you in reliance on the information.

Description:
A Great Country Lifestyle, On The Coast!
EXPRESSIONS OF INTEREST CLOSING WEDNESDAY 6TH DECEMBER @ 5PM
Imagine living in a great family home on a 3.2 acre block of land, with a lovely mature garden, abundant bird life, your own private tennis court, and just a short drive to shops, schools, sporting facilities, coastal towns and beautiful beaches.
This exceptionally well-maintained, 5-bedroom, double-brick home offers an enviable lifestyle to a family who enjoys the best of all worlds.
Sounds like your idea of heaven? Here’s your chance.
- Gate entrance and drive to well-kept garden with assorted English and Australian shrubs/trees
- Golden Elm, Chinese Maple, Golden Ash, Callistemon, Casuarina, Lemon, Red and Yellow Gum
- Double-brick home with gabled roof, return verandah, double garage, carport and storage shed
- Covered entrance to central hall with slate tiled flooring and high letterbox windows for light
- Sunken lounge with raked ceiling, exposed beams, slow-combustion stove and exposed chimney
- Master bedroom with bay window, garden views, walk-in robe, ensuite with vanity, shower, WC
- Three more bedrooms with built-in robes, second bathroom with shower and bath, separate WC
- Linen press in hall, laundry with outside access to clothesline and open office/study area
- Kitchen with U-shaped bench, Westinghouse electric cooktop, St. George wall oven and grill
- Miele dishwasher, cupboard pantry, loads of storage space and natural northern light
- Adjacent dining area with sliding door to large paved terrace and pergola with grapevine
- Perfect venue for outdoor dining and entertainment during Spring, Summer and Autumn months
- Second lounge with slow-combustion heater that easily heats lounge/kitchen/dining areas
- Upstairs to large rumpus/entertainment area with northern balcony - plus two more bedrooms
- Full-size bitumen tennis court with basketball backboard and net - a great play area for kids
- Large storage/work shed (6m x 9m), firewood shed, water tank, chook run, veg. garden, fruit trees
- Double brick insulated between cavity with additional roof insulation
- Solar hot water with off peak boost
- Approximately 1.5 acres of land at rear - half cleared, half treed, fenced with sugar gums for firewood
- 10min drive to Torquay, Barwon Heads, 3min to Warralilly shopping centre, 10min to commuting train and 15min to Belmont
Seize the moment, make an appointment, and see this property for yourself. Don’t miss a wonderful opportunity!
Insights: 70 Breamlea Road, Connewarre VIC 3227 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
"Wytham Farm" Ultimate Sea Change - Two Houses - 14.29 ha (35 acres) approx.
Superbly located in the increasingly popular Connewarre growth corridor,
Wytham Farm with two separate dwellings presents an outstanding opportunity to pursue a Surf Coast rural lifestyle or add to the investment portfolio.
This superb property is loaded with charm and comes with a renovated two-storey homestead and a new separate cottage surrounded by lovely manicured gardens and rustic sundry farm buildings, sheds and yards.
The main residence consists of a bedroom and bathroom on each level with the downstairs area including a family room / third bedroom (with wood heater) opening to a courtyard, laundry, two storerooms and access to the garage and carport. Upstairs living area incorporates a well-appointed kitchen with stone benches and Kleenmaid appliances, dining and living room (OFP) leading to a sunny north-facing balcony.
The second home is three years old and consists of two spacious bedrooms, open plan kitchen/dining/living with open fire place and north facing deck and is currently being rented for $320 per week.
Connected to town water the property is divided into 5 main paddocks with a dam, new three bay machinery shed, original dairy and cattle yards, dog run / kennels, chook yard and is suitable for horses, cattle, sheep or cropping.
Highlighted by a brilliant location close to public transport, the new Warralily Shopping Centre, only ten minutes from Geelong and the seaside township of Barwon Heads, Thirteenth Beach Golf Club plus Torquay and the Surf Coast, and just over sixty minutes from Melbourne via the Ring Road.
If you're in search of a serene sea/tree change for your family or an investment property with dual income, this outstanding property provides it all!
Insights: 4-18 Baenschs Lane, Connewarre VIC 3227 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
A Little Bit Country
You know that laid-back lifestyle you've been dreaming of, well, now you can make it a reality. With a one hectare, 2.47 acre approximately flat block, you can build your dream home (STCA). Just moments from the scenic Bellarine Peninsula and Surf Coast
- Large building envelope grants you plenty of freedom (STCA)
- Fully fenced, dog proof property
- Create your own grand entrance (STCA)
- Treat your family to a swimming pool or tennis court (STCA)
- Approx. 40 foot storage container, approx. 22000l water tank
- Families will appreciate the peaceful court location
- Easy access to Breamlea and 13th Beach will delight surfers
- Primary and secondary schools are a brief drive away
- Proposed Armstrong Creek schools will be conveniently close
- Jump in the car and you'll soon be in the heart of Geelong

Description:
An Exceptional, Once in a Lifetime Investment Opportunity!
Brilliantly positioned, "Cumner Park" - 145 acres (59ha) approx, with 3 road frontages has been held in the one family for well over 100 years!
On the doorstep of Armstrong Creek and an easy commute to Torquay, Barwon Heads, Geelong and the Ring Road, its potential is obvious to an astute investor!
It is currently leased and farmed which remains an option to the purchaser.
The property includes a comfortable character Californian bungalow which has been rewired, comprising four bedrooms and living area with R/C split system and wood heater, a modernized kitchen and bathroom.
Other features include garden and established orchard, town and tank water and massive shedding.
Insights: 430 Lower Duneed Road, Connewarre VIC 3227 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
'BANCOORA’
‘BANCOORA’ in picturesque Grahams Lane, is privately positioned behind Breamlea and Point Impossible. Local to the world class surf beach ‘BANCOORA’ and named after the steamship, stranded in 1891. A stunning home with endless lifestyle benefits and a timeless charm that cannot be replicated.
-Built circa 1890, this homestead has been lovingly and creatively restored and extended by multi-award winning Master Builder, Courtney Dalton
-Recent refurbishments to bathroom and grand main entrance with velux windows for natural light
-Wide sweeping verandahs, 12ft ceilings, baltic pine and hardwood polished floors
-Original baltic lining boards, 12’ skirtings, original double hung windows and solid timber doors
-The floorplan includes a solid timber French Provincial kitchen with adjoining second living zone
-4 spacious BRs with a guest studio/loft or 5th BR
-3 bathrooms, a library and storeroom with 50 lineal metres of shelving
-A notable feature is the charming bar, constructed from Otway Bluegum and was previously a 32ft Cray-fishing boat
-A heated swimming pool with swim jets and partially covered deck with outdoor shower adjoins the second living zone
-This historic property is home to champion ‘Victoria Tower’ show horse stud
-The menage sand arena, 2 stables, tack room and hay shed will appeal to equestrian enthusiasts
-There are 2 yards, 4 paddocks and 3 paddock shelters
-The barn, originally built to house a 60ft schooner, has 10 car spaces, is built from solid Australian hardwood and includes a pot-belly stove
-Abundance of storage shelving and a mezzanine gym can also be found in the amazing barn!
-There is a gorgeous glasshouse, ideal for enjoying sunny Winter’s days
-Double carport with storage, board racks and hanging space for wetsuits, towels etc
-Native/Indigenous gardens with landscaped brook, running into a pond that attracts brolgas, mudlarks, wattlebirds, corellas and beautiful rosellas
-2 x 25,000 L and 1 x 5000 L rainwater tank/s, as well as town water
-2mins from Bancoora Beach, 5mins from 13th Beach, 8mins to Barwon Heads and 10mins to Torquay
-10mins to Marshall train station with an easy 1 hour commute to Melbourne CBD
-School bus shelter 200m from the front gate
-Privacy, security and the best neighbours you could ever wish for!
-Importantly, ‘Bancoora’ has scope to be run as a B&B
This timeless home is truly a once in a lifetime opportunity! If you want to live the exclusive coastal life, you must inspect 'BANCOORA'
Insights: 17 Graham Lane, Connewarre VIC 3227 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
Attention Golfers, Beach Holidaymakers and Investors
Set in the magnificent surrounds of the world-renowned 13th Beach Golf Course estate, this classy single level, apartment offers comfort and convenience in a highly desirable location. With tranquil links landscaping privatising the interior, this leisure based home is a perfect getaway for golf enthusiasts, beach holidaymakers and investors alike.
Gardens nestle the roomy open plan kitchen/living space and adjoining undercover entertaining patio. The kitchen features all catering mod cons including a suite of Fisher & Paykel cooking appliances and dish-drawer. The beneficial north-western aspect enlivens indoor-outdoor living, and a split system assists comfort.
A large in situ shower, floating vanity and toilet feature in the central bathroom. This attractive wet area services the queen and double-sized bedrooms both with built-in wardrobes. A euro-style laundry and generous linen storage complete the floorplan.
A detached remote-access single garage and guest parking are absolute assets.
The gated community lifestyle comes with many onsite perks - golf at your doorstep, restaurants, sporting facilities, gymnasium and private beach access. The low maintenance design and secure environment are ideal for a stress-free, lock-up-and-leave purchase.
Inspect as soon as possible. Investigate the solid holiday rental options!
Insights: 3/110-126 Tomara Drive, Connewarre VIC 3227 was last sold in 2017 and 3 other 2 bedroom unit in Connewarre have recently been sold.

Description:
Are You Ready for a Lifestyle Change?
Welcome to Cashmore Drive at the 13th Beach Golf Links Estate. This gated community offers privacy, integrity in peaceful surrounds. Build your new home nestled amongst existing high quality homes. This block offers you land size of 838sqm approx. and adjoining common property right next to the 4th Hole of the acclaimed Faldo Creek Course.
This location is a gateway to the Bellarine Peninsula, Barwon Heads village and ocean beach with Geelong and Melbourne an easy drive. Make the change and you won’t look back.
